name: Summer Reading Club
description: Summer Reading Clubs, volunteers provide literacy support to students by reading with them and playing literacy games during the summer months. Summer Reading Clubs occur at shelters and transitional homes at the same time each week. Several volunteers attend each session, with student-to-volunteer ratios as low as possible.
